statusbar.label: $(tools) configure
statusbar.detail: configures the build system using CMake

statusbar.label: $(gear) build release

statusbar.detail: configures the build system using CMake

statusbar.label: $(gear) build debug

statusbar.label: $(beaker) test release
statusbar.detail: runs tests in release mode

statusbar.label: $(beaker) test relwithdebinfo
statusbar.detail: runs tests in relwithdebinfo mode

statusbar.label: $(beaker) test debug
statusbar.detail: runs tests in debug mode

statusbar.label: $(graph) codecoverage
statusbar.detail: runs the code coverage analysis

statusbar.label: $(shield) sonar scan
statusbar.detail: runs sonar scan analysis

statusbar.label: $(database) compilation database
statusbar.detail: creates a compile_commands.json file

statusbar.label: $(lightbulb) clang-tidy
statusbar.detail: runs clang-tidy on the C++ code

statusbar.label: $(book) doxygen
statusbar.detail: generates a doxygen documentation

statusbar.label: $(book) open doxygen doc
statusbar.detail: opens the generated doxygen documentation

statusbar.label: $(folder) packagetest
statusbar.detail: generates a package test project located in ./test_package

statusbar.label: $(list-tree) dependency tree
statusbar.detail: generates a dependency tree using graphviz

statusbar.label: $(keyboard) editable add
statusbar.detail: adds the editable mode for this package

statusbar.label: $(debug-disconnect) editable remove
statusbar.detail: remove the editable mode for this package

statusbar.label: $(pencil) clang-format
statusbar.detail: formats the C++ code using clang-format

statusbar.label: $(pencil) cmake-format
statusbar.detail: formats the CMake code using cmake-format

statusbar.label: $(lightbulb) cpplint
statusbar.detail: runs cpplint on the C++ code
